response: "datenprivatsphäre? was ist das noch mal? 🤔 in zeitalter von big data und überwachungskapitalismus seems like a myth. 😱 everyone's talking about data protection, but who's really doing something about it? 🤷‍♂️ time to take matters into our own hands and demand stronger data protection laws! 💪 #datenschutz #privatsphäre #bigdata"
